    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public ActionForward execute(ActionMapping mapping,
                             ActionForm form,
                             HttpServletRequest request,
                             HttpServletResponse response)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Process the request and return an ActionForward instance describing where and how control should be forwarded, or nullif the response has already been completed.
        Overrides:
        execute in class Action
        Parameters:
        mapping - The ActionMapping used to select this instance
        form - The optional ActionForm bean for this request (if any)
        request - The HTTP request we are processing
        response - The HTTP response we are creating
        Returns:
        the ActionForward for the next view
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the application logic throws an exception
